alert.note: Alert for Maverick; Zavala (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 27 at 6:26PM CDT until September 27 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN MAVERICK AND NORTHWESTERN ZAVALA COUNTIES... At 626 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Paloma, or 17 miles northeast of Eagle Pass, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Eagle Pass, Paloma, Darling, Radar Base, Siesta Acres, Fabrica, Elm Creek, and Las Quintas Fronterizas. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
